duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the on-going operations with partners and technology enablers in the financial services industry.
Support the implementation of new generation benefits with different partners and ensure project management for the benefits implementations.
Facilitate coordination for B2B customer support between internal teams and technology partners.
Develop dashboards to track the performance of the new generation of benefits and support the development of additional offers.
Responsible for planning, executing, tracking, and budgetary controls for product launches within the financial services sector.
Analyzing market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Support the activation and growth monitoring of the benefits within the financial services sector.
